author: Special Correspondent
text:
The annual festival of Selliyandiamman Temple in Bhavani town was celebrated by hundreds of devotees with enthusiasm.

The ‘Amman Azhaithal’ event in which a horse took around the deity in a chariot along Mettur Road, Ellaiamman Temple and Anthiyur diversion was marked by devotees walking along smearing themselves with mud and paint. On way, devotees offered salt, chilly, and banana. The changed traffic arrangements will be in place until the completion of ‘Therottam’ on Thursday morning.
title: Selliyandiamman temple fest
